title: Comparative Program of Online vs. Traditional Laboratory-Based Anatomy and Physiology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Life Science Terminology and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Comparative Experimental Environment Design for Adult Learners: Blended Approach Integrating Online (LMS) and Offline (Virtual Lab Kits)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic functions of human body systems (respiratory, circulatory, and digestive)
Learners can analyze experimental data (online simulations/physical observations) and connect them to physiological phenomena
Learners can compare the advantages and disadvantages of two learning methods and select one suitable for their learning style

resources: Physical Experiment Kit (Model Organs, pH Measurement Tools, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
